itemDescription: British magazine editor and documentary maker

wikipedia_page.main:
Colin Willock (13 January 1919 – 26 March 2005) was a magazine editor and a nature documentary writer and producer, working on series such as ITV's Survival.
Aubrey Buxton brought him in to work on the first ever programme in the Survival series in 1961, The London Scene.He was awarded the Royal Geographical Society's Cherry Kearton Medal and Award in 1987.
